alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 23 at 5:17AM MST until December 24 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...West to southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Lower elevations of Converse and eastern Platte counties including the cities of Douglas, Glendo, and Wheatland. * WHEN...Until 2 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County
